summary:
Seasoned tech executive, serial entrepreneur, corporate intrapreneur, advisor, and investor.

Currently in the leadership team at iVisa as Director of People reporting directly to the CEO and President, former Director of Operations (+3 years). Additionally, I am the acting Country Manager for our main sites in Peru, India, Gaza, and The Philippines.

Areas of expertise: Strategy, Operations, Business Development, Corporate Entrepreneurship, Project Management, Human Resources, Marketing, Sales, and Commercial.

Industries: Fintech, HR Tech, Travel Tech, Health Services, Pharmaceutical, Insurance, Start-up, P2P Lending, SaaS, and FMCG.

Contact info:
	e: victor@gorbina.com

Company Secretary.
Legal representative of the company.
Direct reporting to the CEO and President.

Main responsibilities:

i. Work directly with the leadership team to ensure our employees live and breathe the company vision, values, and culture and form a world-class performing team.
ii. Ensure our working culture remains ambitious, positive, and safe during a high growth phase.
iii. Be a trusted advisor on critical business decisions including org design, planning, change management, and challenging people scenarios.
iv. Create robust and fair compensation policies.
v. Re-invent all stages of the employee lifecycle for our different teams with our team leads.
vi. Manage and improve performance management.
vii. Lead the Global Sustainable & CSR strategy of the company.
viii. Make sure we comply with all HR-related regulations globally.
ix. i. Helping to simplify our organization and ways of working on a continuous basis.
